text: Hontōni ten to ji no sōzō, chūya no kōtai, hito o ekisuru mono o hakonde unabara o yuku fune no naka ni, mata arrā ga ten kara fura sete shinda daichi o yomigaera se, ikitoshiikerumono o chijō ni hiroku chiraba seru ame no naka ni, mata kazamuki no henkan, hate wa tenchi no maniatte hōshi suru kumo no naka ni, rikai aru mono e no (arrā no) shirushi ga aru
